articles.title: Russia won't turn off gas supplies to Europe from Friday, Kremlin says - Reuters
articles.description: Rouble payments that Russia is insisting on for its gas exports will affect settlements due in late April and May, and Russia will not turn off gas supplies to Europe on Friday, Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said.
